packages.title: Ultimate Package for Hybrid Limited
details: Smart Cruise Control with stop/start capability

specs.name: Fuel system: Gasoline Direct Injection GDI
Front suspension: MacPherson Strut with coil springs
16-inch Eco-spoke aluminum alloy wheels with P205/65/R16 tires
17-inch Eco-spoke aluminum alloy wheels with P215/55/R17 tires
Blind Spot Detection (BSD) with Rear Cross-traffic Alert and Lane Change Assist
Smart Cruise Control with stop/start capability
Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) with individual tire pressure indicator
Advanced dual front airbags (SRS) with Occupant Classification System (OCS)
Driver and front passenger side-impact airbags (SRS)
Front seatbelt pretensioners and force limiters
Rear LATCH (Lower Anchors and Tethers for CHildren)
Remote keyless entry system with alarm
Dual fold-away heated power bodycolor side mirrors
Chrome exterior door handles with welcome light
Glossy DLO surround and mirror housing
Proximity Key entry with push button start
Power windows with driver’s auto-down/up with pinch protection
Power auto-down/up passenger window with pinch protection
8-way power driver seat with power adjustable lumbar support
Integrated Memory System (IMS) for driver's seat and side mirrors
Leatherette door trim inserts with stitching
Leather-wrapped steering wheel and shift knob
Smart Cruise Control with stop/start capability
Electronic Parking Brake with Automatic Vehicle Hold
Dimension AM/FM/SiriusXM/CD/MP3 premium audio system with subwoofer and external amplifier
4.2-inch color trip computer with Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster
